title: DmC - Devil May Cry Complete Edition - [DZ RePack]
description:
ABOUT THE GAME

The Dante of DmC is a young man who has no respect for authority or indeed society in general. Dante knows that he is not human, but also that he is not like the demons that have tormented him throughout his life. Caught between worlds, he feels like an outcast.
Thanks to his twin brother Vergil, leader of the anti-establishment group called Ã¢â‚¬Å“The OrderÃ¢â‚¬ï¿½, Dante is now discovering and coming to terms with what it means to be the child of a demon and an angel. This split personality has a real impact on gameplay with Dante being able to call upon angel and demon abilities at will, transforming his Rebellion sword on the fly to dramatically affect both combat and movement.

Title: DmC: Devil May Cry Complete Edition
Genre: Action, Adventure
Developer: Ninja Theory
Publisher: Capcom

With this release we include:

* DmC: Devil May Cry (main game)
* VergilÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s Downfall DLC

* Weapon Bundle DLC
* Bloody Palace Mode DLC
